Class Ext.ux.netbox.date.DateRangeEditor

Extends Ext.ux.netbox.FilterEditor.
Defined in DateOperators.js

Editor used to edit date ranges. The DATE_RANGE operator returns this editor.

Constructor Summary
Ext.ux.netbox.date.DateRangeEditor(field, config)
            It instantiates a new DateRangeEditor
 
Method Summary
 Array getValue()
           This method parses the values returned by the RangeField, and casts the values to follow the Y-m-d H:i:s format

Method Detail

getValue

Array getValue()
    This method parses the values returned by the RangeField, and casts the values to follow the Y-m-d H:i:s format
    Returns:
      Array Array of object {label: value: } where value is always in the format Y-m-d H:i:s or it is an empty string if the value entered by the user is not a valid date
